about_the_game:
Experience the classic test of strategy in this 1v1 online multiplayer game. With gameplay reminiscent of a high-stakes game like chess, you'll form your board pieces to infiltrate your opponent's territory and capture their flag while defending your own. Eliminate enemy pieces as you outsmart and outmaneuver your opponent in this dynamic game featuring a respawning system. Each match is a battle of wits and a test of skill as you make calculated moves to gain the upper hand, and fight to bring the enemy flag back to your home base for the ultimate victory. Join now and see if you have what it takes to come out on top.

Features

  • Player vs Player (PvP) mode, where players compete against each other.
  • Player vs Computer (PvE) mode, where players compete against AI opponents.
  • Map Creator/Editor, which allows players to create and customize their own maps for gameplay.
  • Tutorial System including techniques for Basic, Intermediate, and Advanced level Gameplay.



  • Theme Selection, which allows players to choose from different visual themes for the game.
  • Configurable settings such as time limit and flag captures to win.

With gameplay reminiscent of a high-stakes game like chess, you'll form your board pieces to infiltrate your opponent's territory and capture their flag while defending your own. Eliminate enemy pieces as you outsmart and outmaneuver your opponent in this dynamic game featuring a respawning system. Each match is a battle of wits and a test of skill as you make calculated moves to gain the upper hand, and fight to bring the enemy flag back to your home base for the ultimate victory. Join now and see if you have what it takes to come out on top.

Features

  • Player vs Player (PvP) mode, where players compete against each other.
  • Player vs Computer (PvE) mode, where players compete against AI opponents.
  • Map Creator/Editor, which allows players to create and customize their own maps for gameplay.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Capture The Flag

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 8500
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Fight for victory in this fast-paced 1v1 online multiplayer game. Use strategy to infiltrate your opponents zone, eliminate pieces, and capture their flag. With dynamic respawns and intense battles, every match will put your strategy to the test.
